sub_title: Fit technician & Garment Technologist @ Hema Kid's- & Men's Department Taking Care of New Born, Baby, Kids & Menswear
summary:
In het binnen en buitenland heb ik ervaring op gedaan in vele verschillende facetten van product development op zowel de heren-, kinder- en in wat mindere mate de damesafdeling waardoor ik vrij allround ben geworden in mijn inzetbaarheid. 

Ik denk in oplossingen in plaats van problemen en zet me in voor uitdagingen en moeilijk bereikbare doelen, ik plan en structureert vooruitziend en met aandacht voor details, kom regelmatig met nieuwe ideeën, werkwijze en toepassingen en heb daarbij een brede en gevarieerde benadering.

Mijn werk moet mij ook voor uitdagingen zetten waar ik mij met hart en ziel voor kan inzetten, ik zet mijzelf niet op de voorgrond maar neem wel de leiding wanneer de situatie daartoe aanleiding geeft.

school.name: Technical School of Fashion and Design

profile_positions.description:
- Tot stand brengen van maatvoering van kleding.
- Opstellen van gespecificeerde maattabellen op basis van kledingontwerpen.
- Dit vertalen naar een commercieel product.
- Analyseren en beoordelen van aangeleverde monsters, dit volgens vastgestelde richtlijnen.
- Signaleren van verbeterpunten in maatvoering en pasvorm.
- Afstemmen van het doorpasproces.
- Geven van aanwijzingen en instructies aan inkoopassistenten zodat het doorpassen effectief verloopt.
- Adviseren en ondersteunen van inkopers bij het keizen van de juiste leverancier.
- Signaleren van trends en normontwikkelingen in de markt en deze vertalen naar actiepunten.
profile_positions.title: Garment Technologist / Fit Technician

profile_positions.description:
•	  Developing technical specifications and quality standards to meet the V&D requirements.
•	  Supporting the development and maintenance of standard size tables and size blocks.
•	  Continuous evaluation of quality, fit, construction and product performance.
•	Ensure that the here above mentioned products can be taken into production without any problems.
•	To ensure that all production and deliveries are to the quality standard of V&D.
•	Check Sales Samples against the specification and highlight issues, informing the manufacturer and other departments of errors found.
•	Keep fit sessions and give comments on the styles and together with the comments create the measurement chart.
•	Request size sets and by means of, again, fitting and measuring the garments come to the best fit for the garment.
•	Prepare the detail working sheets when orders are written.
profile_positions.title: Garment technologist / Technical designer / Fit specialist

profile_positions.description:
Main job responsibilities:
Co-ordinating the production process from the prototype till
production including quality control of all garments Tops and
Bottoms manufactured in China, India, Bangladesh and other
production countries. Implement and improve measurement charts
for the men’s and children’s department for the brands LIV , LIV
Collection, Soho, Soho Collection Riley & Clark and Marine dept.
for upper and under wear.

• Ensure that the here above-mentioned products can be taken into
production without any problems.
• To ensure that all production and deliveries are to the quality
standard of V&D.
• Check Sales Samples against the specification and highlight
issues, informing the manufacturer and other departments of
errors found.
• Keep fit sessions and give comments on the styles and together
with the comments create the measurement chart.
• Request size sets and by means of, again, fitting and measuring
the garments come to the best fit for the garment.
• Prepare the detail working sheets when orders are written.
profile_positions.title: Garment Technologist

profile_positions.description:
•	Ensure that the here above-mentioned products can be taken into production without any problems.
•	To ensure that all production and deliveries are to the quality standard of Logo -Amsterdam
•	Check Sales Samples against the specification and highlight issues, informing the manufacturer and other departments of errors found.
•	Keep fit sessions and give comments on the styles and together with the comments create the measurement chart.
•	Request size sets and by means of, again, fitting and measuring the garments come to the best fit for the garment.
•	Prepare the detail working sheets when orders are written.
•	Take care of accessories and make sure that there is always enough stock for production and develop new accessories when needed.
•	Check embroideries and prints on there quality and make.
•	 Approve lab-dips if they reach our standard.
•	Visit manufacturers abroad to improve the communication, workmanship and resolve production problems when needed
profile_positions.title: Garment technologist

volunteer_experiences.description:
At home I'm helping people with Energetic therapy and Hypnotherapy. 

This I do for 10 years already, it is a sort of hobby I do next to my day job.
